The Johns Hopkins Medical Campus

Please note that when dialing from a Johns Hopkjns‘ campus
phone, the last five digits are all that is necessary. (For example,
if you want to reach 410-955-5000, dial only 5-5000).

Directions to The Johns Hopkins Medical Campus

THEJOHNS FROM
HOPKINS AT ~ PENNSYLVANIA
GREEN SPRING

PIKESVILLE












M
FREDERICK AND
WESTERN MARYLAND

From Washington, D.C., and Virginia and
the 1-95 access at BWI Airport

Take I-95 North to Exit 53 (I-395 North) into
downtown Baltimore. (Note: Do not take the Martin
Luther King Jr. Blvd. fork of the exit.)

Take the Conway Street exit.

Turn LEFT onto MD-2 N / LIGHT ST.

Turn RIGHT onto Pratt Street.

Stay on Pratt for 1.4 miles to Broadway; turn LEFT on
Broadway.

From Broadway turn LEFT onto Orleans Street.

Go one block to N. Caroline Street and turn RIGHT.
Follow the signs to patient parking.

The entrance to the Visitor Parking McElderry Street
Garage is on the right.

After parking your car, follow signs to the Hospital from
the Outpatient Center.




~ FROM NEW YORK
AND PHILADELPHIA

From Philadelphia, New York and
Northeastern Baltimore Suburbs

Take I-95 South toward Baltimore to Exit 57
(Boston Street and O’Donnell Street).
Proceed on Boston Street approximately two miles
and turn LEFT onto Fleet Street.
Follow Fleet Street to Broadway; turn RIGHT on
Broadway.
From Broadway turn LEFT onto Orleans Street.
Go one block to N. Caroline Street and turn RIGHT.
Follow the signs to patient parking.

The entrance to the Visitor Parking McElderry Street
Garage is on the RIGHT.
After parking your car, follow signs to the Hospital
from the Outpatient Center.

From York, Central Pennsylvania and
Northern Baltimore Suburbs ‘

Take I-83 South (Harrisburg Expressway) into
Baltimore.

Exit at Fayette Street and turn LEFT.

Follow Fayette toward the medical campus.

Follow Fayette Street to Broadway and turn LEFT.
From Broadway turn LEFT onto Orleans Street.

Go one block to N. Caroline Street and turn RIGHT.
Follow the signs to patient parking.

The entrance to the Visitor Parking McElderry Street
Garage is on the RIGHT.

After parking your car, follow signs to the Hospital
from the Outpatient Center.

Pa1800] OS[e & 1.1.°€/CT-$S6-01% ‘001 1soure))

From Annapolis and
Maryland's Eastern Shore

From Route 50, take I-97 toward Baltimore and follow
I-97 to the Baltimore Beltway (I-695) toward Towson.
Take the Beltway to the Baltimore-Washington Parkway
(I-295) North.

Follow 1-295 into Baltimore (it becomes Russell Street).
Turn RIGHT on Pratt Street.

Stay on Pratt for 1.4 miles to Broadway; turn LEFT on
Broadway. :

From Broadway turn LEFT onto Orleans Street.

Go one block to N. Caroline Street and turn RIGHT.
Follow the signs to patient parking.

The entrance to the Visitor Parking McElderry Street
Garage is on the RIGHT. After parking your car, follow
signs to the Hospital from the Outpatient Center.

From Frederick and Western Maryland

Take I-70 East.

Merge onto I-695 S/Baltimore
Beltway outer loop via EXIT 91A
toward [-95 S/Glen Burnie.
Merge onto US-40 E via EXIT
15A toward Baltimore.

Turn LEFT onto N. Broadway.
From Broadway turn LEFT onto
Orleans Street.

Go one block to N. Caroline
Street and turn RIGHT.

Follow the signs to patient
parking.

The entrance to the Visitor
Parking McElderry Street Garage
is on the RIGHT. After parking
your cat, follow signs to the
Hospital from the Outpatient
Center.

To Park at the Johns Hopkins School of Medicine
Follow the directions at left from your location.

Turn LEFT from Broadway past Orleans Street.

Go one block and turn RIGHT on Monument Street
Continue to Washington Street and turn LEFT.

The Washington Garage entrance is on the RIGHT
Or continue to Washington Street and turn LEFT

on E. Madison. The Rutland Garage entrance is on
the LEFT.

To Park at the Johns Hopkins Kimmel Cancer
Center - Weinberg Building

Follow the directions at left from your location.
Turn left from Broadway past Orleans Street.

Go one block to Jefferson Street and turn RIGHT.
Follow the signs to patient parking,. :

Directions to The Johns Hopkins Medical Campus

THEJOHNS FROM
HOPKINS AT ~ PENNSYLVANIA
GREEN SPRING

PIKESVILLE












M
FREDERICK AND
WESTERN MARYLAND

From Washington, D.C., and Virginia and
the 1-95 access at BWI Airport

Take I-95 North to Exit 53 (I-395 North) into
downtown Baltimore. (Note: Do not take the Martin
Luther King Jr. Blvd. fork of the exit.)

Take the Conway Street exit.

Turn LEFT onto MD-2 N / LIGHT ST.

Turn RIGHT onto Pratt Street.

Stay on Pratt for 1.4 miles to Broadway; turn LEFT on
Broadway.

From Broadway turn LEFT onto Orleans Street.

Go one block to N. Caroline Street and turn RIGHT.
Follow the signs to patient parking.

The entrance to the Visitor Parking McElderry Street
Garage is on the right.

After parking your car, follow signs to the Hospital from
the Outpatient Center.




~ FROM NEW YORK
AND PHILADELPHIA

From Philadelphia, New York and
Northeastern Baltimore Suburbs

Take I-95 South toward Baltimore to Exit 57
(Boston Street and O’Donnell Street).
Proceed on Boston Street approximately two miles
and turn LEFT onto Fleet Street.
Follow Fleet Street to Broadway; turn RIGHT on
Broadway.
From Broadway turn LEFT onto Orleans Street.
Go one block to N. Caroline Street and turn RIGHT.
Follow the signs to patient parking.

The entrance to the Visitor Parking McElderry Street
Garage is on the RIGHT.
After parking your car, follow signs to the Hospital
from the Outpatient Center.

From York, Central Pennsylvania and
Northern Baltimore Suburbs ‘

Take I-83 South (Harrisburg Expressway) into
Baltimore.

Exit at Fayette Street and turn LEFT.

Follow Fayette toward the medical campus.

Follow Fayette Street to Broadway and turn LEFT.
From Broadway turn LEFT onto Orleans Street.

Go one block to N. Caroline Street and turn RIGHT.
Follow the signs to patient parking.

The entrance to the Visitor Parking McElderry Street
Garage is on the RIGHT.

After parking your car, follow signs to the Hospital
from the Outpatient Center.

From Annapolis and
Maryland's Eastern Shore

From Route 50, take I-97 toward Baltimore and follow
I-97 to the Baltimore Beltway (I-695) toward Towson.
Take the Beltway to the Baltimore-Washington Parkway
(I-295) North.

Follow 1-295 into Baltimore (it becomes Russell Street).
Turn RIGHT on Pratt Street.

Stay on Pratt for 1.4 miles to Broadway; turn LEFT on
Broadway. :

From Broadway turn LEFT onto Orleans Street.

Go one block to N. Caroline Street and turn RIGHT.
Follow the signs to patient parking.

The entrance to the Visitor Parking McElderry Street
Garage is on the RIGHT. After parking your car, follow
signs to the Hospital from the Outpatient Center.

From Frederick and Western Maryland

Take I-70 East.

Merge onto I-695 S/Baltimore
Beltway outer loop via EXIT 91A
toward [-95 S/Glen Burnie.
Merge onto US-40 E via EXIT
15A toward Baltimore.

Turn LEFT onto N. Broadway.
From Broadway turn LEFT onto
Orleans Street.

Go one block to N. Caroline
Street and turn RIGHT.

Follow the signs to patient
parking.

The entrance to the Visitor
Parking McElderry Street Garage
is on the RIGHT. After parking
your cat, follow signs to the
Hospital from the Outpatient
Center.

To Park at the Johns Hopkins School of Medicine
Follow the directions at left from your location.

Turn LEFT from Broadway past Orleans Street.

Go one block and turn RIGHT on Monument Street
Continue to Washington Street and turn LEFT.

The Washington Garage entrance is on the RIGHT
Or continue to Washington Street and turn LEFT

on E. Madison. The Rutland Garage entrance is on
the LEFT.

To Park at the Johns Hopkins Kimmel Cancer
Center - Weinberg Building

Follow the directions at left from your location.
Turn left from Broadway past Orleans Street.

Go one block to Jefferson Street and turn RIGHT.
Follow the signs to patient parking,. :
